section.p: Ankh uses status icons to show what changes has been done on a working copy. Ankh identifies if a file is under revision control and shows the appropriate status in front it in Visual Studio .NET solution explorer. All files under revision control will be shown with the '' icon. Ankh updates the status icons AFTER a file has been saved.

Supported status icons:
- Added item
- Conflicted item
- Deleted item.
- Locked item.
- Modified item.
- Item under revision controll, and unchanged.
- Item NOT under revision controll.
NOTE: Ankh updates the status icons AFTER files have been saved.
